• HTML5 game with real-time multiplayer mining gameplay using MQTT for networking
  • Procedural world generation with ores, building mechanics, and shop system
  • Mobile-optimized controls with touch D-pad and action buttons
  • Save system with local IndexedDB storage and cloud sync via Puter FS
  • Admin features for host management, player kicking, and world administration
    const Game = new GameEngine();
    const Network = new NetworkManager();
    const UI = new UIManager();

This is a browser-based multiplayer mining game built with HTML5 Canvas and WebSockets/MQTT for real-time networking. Players explore procedurally generated worlds, mine resources, build structures, and trade with others. The game features mobile-optimized touch controls, a shop system for upgrades, and cloud save functionality. Admin tools allow hosts to manage servers and players.
